examples.text: Sadece küçücük bir beyaz yalan, yahu.
examples.translation: It's just a tiny white lie!

examples.text: Zavallı adama biraz şefkatli davran, yahu.
examples.translation: Show some kindness to the poor man!

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish یاهو (yāhū), from یا (yā, “o!”) + هو (hū, “any individual talked to, (in Sufism) God”), from Arabic يَا (yā) + هُوَ (huwa). Cognate of Azerbaijani yahu.
